1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Freedom of Speech Comedy Show (TV Series 2008– )

1.plot: The late night comedy show that doesn't hold back. No Contests! No Gimmicks! No Censorship! Just comics doing what they do best - Being Funny! Join award winning comedian Don Barnhart (winner of 2007 American Idol Comedy Contest) as he catches up with the best up and coming comedians as they let loose with no restrictions on language, content or material filmed live and uncensored at the best comedy clubs across the country. There's no racial profiling here and it's not your typically "themed" show. There's no Asian Invasion, Latino Laff Riots, Urban Legends of ...

imdb.plot outline: The Freedom of Speech Comedy Show is the no holds barred comedy show showcasing the best new comedians working today. Each comedian on the show is a professional touring act with national credits - but you haven't seen them like this!!! Doing their act live at a comedy club with no restrictions on language, content or material... Uncensored/Not dirty. The Freedom of Speech Comedy Show allows the comedians to choose the material that they think is funny with no restrictions or interference from the producers or networks. From political to silly, edgy to goofy, our only rule is, "It's got to be funny!"
imdb.title: Freedom of Speech Comedy Show
akas: Freedom of Speech Comedy Show (United States)
plot: No contests, no gimmicks and no censorship. Just the best in stand up comedy.::Anonymous

The _Freedom of Speech Comedy Show_ (qv) is the no holds barred comedy show showcasing the best new comedians working today. Each comedian on the show is a professional touring act with national credits - but you haven't seen them like this!!! Doing their act live at a comedy club with no restrictions on language, content or material... Uncensored/Not dirty. The _Freedom of Speech Comedy Show_ (qv) allows the comedians to choose the material that they think is funny with no restrictions or interference from the producers or networks. From political to silly, edgy to goofy, our only rule is, "It's got to be funny!"::Don Barnhart
